job_history.work_description: To sign clients in and to be sure they are registered for class. To lead, instruct, and teach choreographed group fitness classes that thrive on motivation and proper queing with an emphasis on active listening. To demonstrate proper form and safety techniques in an effort to achieve and receive the best results.

Perform basic office duties being proficient MAC and PC, answer phones, emailing clients, scheduling events around seasonal calendar To make and reserve reservations for an even flow, to create an inviting environment that delivers quick and efficient service To serve customers in a fast-paced environment while being able to multi-task effectively with a pleasant demeanor and heart.

To open Wellness Center, answering phones, scheduling appointments, creating monthly Newsletters, Calendar of Events for internal staff To communicate via intranet for VA employees, to send reminders for scheduled events To develop and maintain existing Excel Spreadsheets in an effort to track progress of trained staff members and new members.

skills.name: Fitness Instruction
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience leading group fitness classes, demonstrating proper form and safety techniques, and motivating clients, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has experience serving customers in a fast-paced environment, handling multiple tasks, and maintaining a pleasant demeanor, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Office Administration
skills.explanation: Has experience performing basic office duties, such as answering phones, emailing clients, and scheduling events, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience communicating with clients, staff, and employees via phone, email, and intranet, indicating a solid level of proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has experience managing multiple tasks, scheduling events, and maintaining a calendar, showing a solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Has experience developing and maintaining Excel spreadsheets, but the extent of this experience is limited, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience leading group fitness classes, but the extent of this experience is limited, indicating some practical experience in leadership.
